tool_description: Border Solutions API gives you a fully landed cost quote for dozens of countries in the WTO. Use these Duty and Tax rates to get an estimate on import fees! Border Solutions supports three countries: Canada, Australia and Mexico. If shipping to Canada you must use the additional field of "shipToProvince". Example {"shipToProvince": "ON"}
name: Border Solutions Duty and Vat Calculator
title: Border Solutions Duty and Vat Calculator
tool_name: Border Solutions Duty and Vat Calculator

api_list.name: /quote
api_list.description: Fully landed cost Tax, Duty & VAT quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bordersolutions-border-solutions-duty-and-vat-calculator-v1.p.rapidapi.com/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bordersolutions-border-solutions-duty-and-vat-calculator-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
